channel.title: Mezzy Scape Client
channel.description:
Ok so im having trouble getting mezzyscape run to work in the client. I'm in the proccess of learning java so don't suggest it here is a pic of what ive got throught: [url=http://uppit.com/vj7e5uvhiths/pic.png]http://uppit.com/vj7e5uvhiths/pic.png[/url] Its a download because idk how to insert images on here... here is the mezzyscape run in the client
@echo off start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT
and when i click run the cmd prompt it opens and closes really fast

item.title: Mezzy Scape Client
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

[quote=“Redemtion, post:2, topic:413225”][quote author=Zatko link=topic=514696.msg3736792#msg3736792 date=1315014344]
paroko vei misioner va cala makio ver disomimo parako eso milo dilo re
[/quote]
if you have something to say be constructive with your posts, not just random shit like I’ve been seeing you post.
Also try taking out the EXIT in the cmd thing. :)[/quote]

hello sir, my server is named after u

OT: are you using the client that was posted on the new mezzyscape thread?

Read full topic
